  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3611</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3611</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Galí: Característiques personals</string>
            <string language="en">Galí: Personal characteristics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galí: Persönliche Eigenschaften</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galí : Caractéristiques personnelles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galí: Características pessoais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galí: Caratteristiche personali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galν: Προσωπικά χαρακτηριστικά</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Activitats interactives adreçades a l'alumnat nouvingut. Inclouen la presentació i la pràctica del vocabulari bàsic de les sensacions i sentiments personals. Les activitats promouen la comprensió i l'expressió oral i escrita.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive activities aimed at pupils who have recently moved to Catalonia. Presentation and practice of the basic vocabulary for personal feelings. The activities promote oral and written comprehension and expression.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió oral</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comunicació oral</string>
            <string language="en">speech communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió del text</string>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión del texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Aktivitäten strebten Schüler an, die
vor kurzem nach Katalonien umgezogen sind. Darstellung und 
Praxis des grundlegenden Wortschatzes für persönliche Gefühle. 
Die Aktivitäten fördern Mund- und schriftliches Erfassen und 
Ausdruck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les activités interactives ont visé les élèves
qui se sont récemment déplacés en Catalogne. Présentation et
pratique du vocabulaire de base pour des sentiments personnels. 
Les activités favorisent la compréhension et l'expression 
orales et écrites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As atividades interativas visaram os alunos que se
têm movido recentemente para Catalonia. Apresentação e 
prática do vocabulário básico para sentimentos pessoais. As 
atividades promovem a compreensão e a expressão orais e escritas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le attività interattive hanno puntato sugli 
allievi che recentemente si sono mossi in Catalogna. 
Presentazione e pratica del vocabolario di base per le 
sensibilità personali. Le attività promuovono la comprensione 
e l'espressione orali e scritte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικές δραστηριότητες που στοχεύουν στους μαθητές 
που έχουν κινηθεί πρόσφατα προς την Καταλωνία. Παρουσίαση 
και πρακτική του βασικού λεξιλογίου για τα προσωπικά 
συναισθήματα. Οι δραστηριότητες προωθούν την προφορικές και 
γραπτές κατανόηση και την έκφραση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechfunkanlage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverständnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission de la parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension des textes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação de discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">communicazione verbale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione del testo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεκτική επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση κειμένων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
